      • self

        protected abstract T self()

      • withStatusInterval

        public T withStatusInterval(int time,
                            TimeUnit format)
        从接口复制的说明: ChainedCommonStreamBuilder
        Specifies the number of time between status packets sent back to the server. This allows for easier monitoring of the progress from server. A value of zero disables the periodic status updates completely, although an update will still be sent when requested by the server, to avoid timeout disconnect. The default value is 10 seconds.
        指定者:
        withStatusInterval 在接口中 ChainedCommonStreamBuilder<T extends ChainedCommonStreamBuilder<T>>
        参数:
        time - positive time
        format - format for specified time
        返回:
        not null fluent

      • withStartPosition

        public T withStartPosition(LogSequenceNumber lsn)
        从接口复制的说明: ChainedCommonStreamBuilder
        Specify start position from wich backend will start stream changes. If parameter will not specify, streaming starts from restart_lsn. For more details see pg_replication_slots description.
        指定者:
        withStartPosition 在接口中 ChainedCommonStreamBuilder<T extends ChainedCommonStreamBuilder<T>>
        参数:
        lsn - not null position from which need start replicate changes
        返回:
        not null fluent

      • withSlotName

        public T withSlotName(String slotName)
        从接口复制的说明: ChainedCommonStreamBuilder
        Replication slots provide an automated way to ensure that the master does not remove WAL segments until they have been received by all standbys, and that the master does not remove rows which could cause a recovery conflict even when the standby is disconnected.
        指定者:
        withSlotName 在接口中 ChainedCommonStreamBuilder<T extends ChainedCommonStreamBuilder<T>>
        参数:
        slotName - not null replication slot already exists on server.
